model
Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
  model.Teacher

public class Teacher
extends java.lang.Object

This class represent a teacher, his informations, his preferences and all the course he teaches.

Author:
Dubruille Xavier, Delange Jonas

Method Detail

setPreferedSlide

public void setPreferedSlide(int timeSlide,
                             int pref)
This will set the teacher's preference for a particular day

Parameters:
timeSlide - the moment (day and period) to witch we want to set the preference
pref - an Interger between 0 and 10, representing the importance of the preference 0 if it's a perfect moment and 10 if it's an impossible one

getPreferedTimeSlides

public int[] getPreferedTimeSlides()
Get all the preferences of the teacher

Returns:
the int[] containing the teacher preference the indexes represent the moment, and the value the preference for that moment

getCards

public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
Get all the cards the teacher has

Returns:
all the teacher's cards

putLocal

public void putLocal(int priority,
                     Room room,
                     Lesson lesson)
If a teacher prefer a particular room for a course, we can set it here. Not used yet.

Parameters:
priority - the level of the preference
room - the room the teacher want
lesson - the lesson for witch he want this preference

Set all the card of the teacher Should be used.

Parameters:
coll - the list of all cards
